thread.title: Amber Rose and Blac Chyna Pull the Plug on Planned Reality Show
thread.title_full: Amber Rose and Blac Chyna Pull the Plug on Planned Reality Show

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Amber Rose and Blac Chyna Pull the Plug on Planned Reality Show
text:
Comments Amber and Blac are reportedly no longer working on their reality series as both of them are busy with various upcoming solo projects. 
Amber Rose and Blac Chyna have pulled the plug on their planned reality show , TMZ reports. The two best friends allegedly told friends they have various projects which prevent them from joining forces on a reality series. Amber is reportedly "in the process" of getting her own talk show, while Blac Chyna has various product deals. The site goes on to claim that the two hot ladies are not in good terms right now as Blac was absent from Amber's Slut Walk in downtown L.A. last week. However, Amber and Blac have proved their friendship is still going strong. On Friday, October 9, both of them took to Instagram to promote an upcoming Atlantic City appearance together. "Who's coming to hangout @PoolAfterDark in Atlantic City with me and my girl @Blacchyna & #Beatclan on 11/14?? #Skamlife," Amber wrote. Blac, meanwhile, posted, "Who's coming to hang @PoolAfterDark with my girl @amberrose & #Beatclan on 11/14?? #Skamlife." A photo posted by www.Lashedbar.co (@blacchyna) on Oct 9, 2015 at 10:01am PDT Amber and Blac were previously reported to get their own reality show on MTV. According to sources, the series would focus on the two sexy ladies taking care of their kids while juggling work, including club appearances.
